# Git Practices

## Git Ignore
All of the projects should contain `.gitignore` at the root folder including:
```
##
# Configurations
/node_modules
/.idea
/.vscode
.env


##
# Compiled source
*.com
*.class
*.dll
*.exe
*.o
*.so
*.pyc
*.crx


##
# Packages
*.7z
*.dmg
*.gz
*.iso
*.jar
*.rar
*.tar
*.zip


##
# Logs and databases
*.log
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*


##
# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db
tmp/
```
